abstract.text: Information about external user created from OAuth.
Hashtag that can be mapped to the category.
Application which is main API component for Vernissage photos sharing platform.
Entity that holds access tokens used in authorisations process.
Information about disposabled domains. That kind of domains cannot be used during registration process.
Entity that holds all system settings.
Follow stores information about followers and following users.
Events that occurs in the system.
Max-Age cache setting for static centent served by S3 CDN: https://http.dev/cache-control.
